game.name: To Get There
game.shortDescription: To Get There is a turn-based puzzle. Manage a group of robots, plan your moves, collect energy sources, and avoid traps. Simple and intuitive mechanics, but truly challenging levels that require attention and strategic planning.
game.shortDescriptionEn: To Get There is a turn-based puzzle. Manage a group of robots, plan your moves, collect energy sources, and avoid traps. Simple and intuitive mechanics, but truly challenging levels that require attention and strategic planning.
